import wcagService from'js/wcagService';import _ from'lodash';export const initializeStandardSublocation=provider=>{const sublocationStyles={};if(provider.awSubLocationPref){const verticalLayout=provider.awSubLocationPref.orientation==='HORIZONTAL';const flipLayout=provider.awSubLocationPref.flipLayout;if(verticalLayout){if(flipLayout){sublocationStyles.verticalReverse=true;}else{sublocationStyles.vertical=true;}}else{if(flipLayout){sublocationStyles.horizontalReverse=true;}}}wcagService.applyFocusOnMain();wcagService.updateArialabelForDuplicateLandmarks();return sublocationStyles;};export const updateSearchStateWithSelection=(searchState,selectionData)=>{if(!_.isEmpty(selectionData)){let newSearchstate=searchState?{...searchState.value}:undefined;if(newSearchstate){if(selectionData.source==='primary'){newSearchstate.pwaSelection=selectionData.selected?selectionData.selected:[];}else if(selectionData.source==='base'||selectionData.source===undefined){newSearchstate.pwaSelection=[];}searchState.update(newSearchstate);}}};
